Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: "In the Church of Machina's hall, Zavier clutches his head in despair while Cervantes stands to the side, methodically counting their lost supplies."}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: '...Fuel depleted... Engine propellant depleted...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Insulation materials depleted... Fiber structures depleted... Composite materials depleted...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'My supplies! My materials! My resources!! My starship—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He clutches his head in agony.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Eek—what's going on here?", 4: '18'}
{3: 'Nanami bounces down from upstairs and tilts her head at the chaotic scene in the hall.'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "I'll fight the Red Tide to the death—!!!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Charge!! Fight to the death—!!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'The mutated Red Tide has devoured several nearby warehouses where supplies were stored...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Mmm-mph! Mmm! Mmph!'}
{3: 'Having screwed his head back onto his neck, Zavier looks utterly defeated.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Calculation complete.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'The warehouses corrupted by Red Tide contained mainly consumable supplies that Zavier had collected and stored for the starship.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A holographic inventory of lost supplies materializes in the center as Cervantes projects it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "If it's just fuel we need, maybe we could find it somewhere else?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "It's not just the consumable supplies... Actually... actually, our biggest loss is... the reactor.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Why in the world would you hide the reactor in the outer ruins?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: '...I put it there because I was worried about accidents during the experiments! Who in their right mind would keep a reactor at home?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'How was I supposed to know that damned thing would burst in from exactly that way...', 4: '2'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hmm, the reactor situation sure is nerve-wracking. If my memory serves me correctly, Zavier and I salvaged that one from some abandoned research facility a long time ago...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'How much do we have left?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He skims through the list Cervantes prepared.'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: "Sigh... We don't even have enough fuel left to circle the Earth once.", 4: '2'}
{3: "It's clear that, with the amount of fuel left, there is no time the starship will ever make it into space."}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "Let's stick to the original plan and head to the Arctic Route Union first.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "Aerospace City is located in the part of the Arctic Route Union that's close to Kowloong...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh, right! Aerospace City! That's where the magnetic acceleration track is!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Yes, Sage. Aerospace City has てぃs magnetic acceleration track called "The Bifrost" that\'s powered by a cold fusion reactor.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Furthermore, Aerospace City was responsible for launching the Dawn-III spacecraft. It was also where Eden I, the predecessor to Babylonia, was developed and technically validated.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'We should be able to launch our starship if we go there.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Yulia currently rules the city. Hanying once helped her drive out Schulz, so I believe there should be room for cooperation between the Church of Machina and Aerospace City.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zavier', 3: "Oh! A cold fusion reactor! Now that's something!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Zavier becomes excited once again.'}
{3: 'The idea of going to Aerospace City is unanimously approved.'}
{3: 'With ongoing modifications hastily wrapped up, the starship embarks on its one-way journey.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1102.jpg'}
{3: 'With its engines roaring, the starship finally emerges from the cavern beneath the scorched earth and breaks through to daylight.'}
{3: 'Optical camouflage system activated, structural force field engaged, engines running steady, cruise mode initialized...'}
{3: 'The massive starship glides low over human ruins.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5001_03.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5001_03.jpg'}
{3: 'As the thermal shields lower one by one over the portholes, Nanami, now sitting by the window, peers through the gaps at the world outside.'}
{3: 'The countdown ticks away beside her as she feels the pull of destiny.'}
{3: 'She knows exactly what that future holds.'}
{3: 'The mechanoids remaining on Earth bring an even greater catastrophe upon human civilization.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2601_10.jpg'}
{3: 'In that future, the soul-bearing mechanoid girl exiles herself to space, giving humanity its only chance of survival.'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: 'I think you need no reminder, Nanami, but...'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: "I'm you from the future."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieShizhong01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Giving up her freedom, she became a central AI that leads the spaceship and all the awakened machines on a permanent journey through the infinite universe.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieShizhong01.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5001_03.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5001_03.jpg'}
{1: '0', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{3: 'Everything is moving toward the future that "fate" has predetermined.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1003.jpg'}
{3: 'The Gray Raven Commandant enters the Hetero Tower, never returns, and the Red Tide engulfs everything.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1094.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "The only change is the mysterious girl who appears in the Red Tide, except Nanami had no luck trying to find out the Gray Raven Commandant's whereabouts from her."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory578.jpg'}
{3: 'An ever-winter will descend next—and if the mechanoids are left unchecked on Earth...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory547.jpg'}
{3: "A torrent of steel from her memory once again submerges humanity's last stronghold."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Does it really have to end like this?', 3: '50', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{3: 'Does it really have to end like this?'}
{3: 'A tiny voice keeps echoing in her heart.'}
{1: 'Does she really have no other choice but to push that button that leads to fate and submit to an inevitable end?', 3: '45', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{3: 'Does she really have no other choice but to push that button that leads to fate and submit to an inevitable end?'}
{1: 'Does she really have no choice but to abandon Earth, forsake everything about humanity, and lead the mechanoids into exile among the stars?', 3: '45', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{3: 'Does she really have no choice but to abandon Earth, forsake everything about humanity, and lead the mechanoids into exile among the stars?'}
{1: 'But what can she, in her current state... what can she possibly leave behind for this scarred planet?', 3: '50', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{3: 'But what can she, in her current state... what can she possibly leave behind for this scarred planet?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5001_03.jpg'}
{3: 'Nanami stares blankly at her own shadow, lost in thought.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1104.jpg'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Woah! Haicma! I swear you never make a noise when you walk!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'You were just too focused, Sage.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I was just going through stuff in my head!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Mechanoids and humans can definitely get along well! Arcana is wrong...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami pouts, her enthusiasm visibly deflated.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Did you have another argument with Arcana?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I know she's just looking out for the mechanoids, but I still don't like the way she puts things.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Always going on about how humans are the mechanoids' greatest enemies, and how humans will definitely start attacking mechanoids and stuff... ugh... I don't want to hear any of that!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "...I'm here to bring you up to speed about the Red Tide.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Haicma considers for a moment before steering the conversation in a different direction.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "As the starship continues northward, we've found that most of the conservation areas we've encountered... have been consumed by the mutated Red Tide.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Have you come across any humans along the way...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "We've encountered several groups of migrating humans along the way, all heading toward the Arctic Joint Route.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Star managed to get some information out of them without revealing ourselves.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Babylonia has joined forces with the Forsaken and Akdilek's human forces and is continuing full-scale rescue operations for survivors on the ground.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'The Punishing Virus in the mutated Red Tide keeps rising. The humans seem unable to enter the areas corrupted by the Red Tide, which are their former conservation areas.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'To obtain samples for analysis, Spooner and I attempted to venture deep into the ruins the Red Tide had breached...', 4: '2'}
{3: "Haicma gently lowers her voice and leans close to Nanami's ear."}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'We rescued a group of semi-awakened mechanoids, and... humans trapped in the ruins.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Humans?! From ruins... surrounded by the Red Tide?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Yes, quite unbelievable, isn't it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'They dug downward to create a temporary safe zone. They were barely surviving with just a small filter unit and some serum.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'When we arrived, some were already severely infected, but they were still alive and in surprisingly good spirits.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "...Spooner and I kept this from Arcana. We're keeping them for the time being in the lowest level of the starship.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'These humans showed no signs of aggression—', 4: '2'}
{3: 'A tremendous crash echoes from the bottom of the starship, followed by the sound of chaotic footsteps.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory568.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The Corrupted, their eyes burning red, slowly creep toward the corner.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alison', 3: "W-why are these things here?! That's where the mechanoids keep their supplies, no?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Berna', 3: 'Oh no, Star—', 4: '2'}
{3: "The tiny robot desperately cranks its speaker to maximum volume, trying to draw the Corrupted's attention."}
{2: 'The Star', 3: 'No, Aya, there are humans over there. Sage said to never do them any harm...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She wipes away her tears and turns to run toward the nearby mezzanine.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Berna', 3: "Hey! That way's a dead end—", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alison', 3: 'What are you doing?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Berna', 3: "—The mechanoids took us in! We can't just turn our backs on them now!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Berna', 3: 'A mechanoid is as good as dead if they get infected by the Punishing Virus! I still have one serum, I can—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alison', 3: 'Let me go. I can—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before she can finish her sentence, Berna rushes out.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Without hesitation, she opens fire at the Corrupted.'}
{3: 'The outdated weapon proves ineffective against the Corrupted.'}
{3: 'Enraged, it whirls around and charges at the humans—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Whoa! Why are these things here?!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "Nanami's longsword precedes her voice."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlash02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlash02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "Nanami's shield guards the girl next to her precisely as her nimble swordplay forces the Corrupted back step by step."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'You bad boy... now fall!', 4: '1'}
{3: "The starship's floor panel opens, sending the Corrupted plummeting into the void below."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Phew, that was way too close. Thank goodness Nanami got here in time.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The young girl collapses to the ground, completely drained.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Thank you so much for earlier! Star would've gotten infected if it weren't for you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Berna', 3: "Ohh, don't mention it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Berna', 3: "That mechanoid suddenly burst out from over there... We didn't even have time to react...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Over there...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Trailblazer collected these supplies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Trailblazer's scanning equipment hasn't been updated, which is why it wasn't able to detect mechanoids with low infection levels.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "The Corrupted managed to sneak in during that time. They didn't cause too much damage, though, fortunately.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Gee, Lazer, that's super careless of you! We all would have been in serious trouble had the Punishing Virus made it into the Gray Tower...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'After connecting the frame to the Gray Tower and thoroughly checking its interior systems, Nanami breathes a sigh of relief when nothing appears amiss.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Looks like we'll need more—and bigger—weapons on the starship...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'The Star', 3: 'Humm... Are you okay?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Star, who showed no signs of fear drawing the Corrupted away just now, comes running back while whimpering. She looks at Berna, who is still sitting where she fell.'}
{2: 'Berna', 3: "...It's fine. We're just doing what we should.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Berna', 3: "We'll lose our temporary home ourselves if this starship ever gets destroyed...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory570.jpg'}
{3: 'The massive starship glides low over the city that humans once called home.'}
{3: 'At some point, the mechanoids seem to have become less hostile toward the humans.'}
{3: 'Having gotten a piece of mind from Nanami, all of the mechanoids—even Trailblazer, who was big on getting the humans out of the starship—softened their stance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'The Star', 3: "Aya's such a dummy! Star wins this round!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aya', 3: 'Uuurrrgghh—!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'The Star', 3: "It's not because of the humans! Star is just that awesome!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Star', 3: 'Not all humans are bad...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aya', 3: 'Uuuurrrrggghhh—!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'The Star', 3: "Okay, okay. I know, I know. I'm not saying all humans are good, either. I know what you're getting at here...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Star', 3: "It's just... humans don't seem all that bad after all...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She steals a glance at Berna, who sits nearby, focused on her work.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Ahem... hey, human!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'How did you modify that weapon last time?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Just made some minor adjustments, and my compatibility rating increased by 4.29%...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Berna', 3: 'Ah, haha, I just noticed you seemed more comfortable with your left... mechanical arm? So I adjusted the grip angle slightly...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Comfortable...? What does "comfortable" mean?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Berna', 3: "Um, it's like... which mechanical arm do you use more often, the left one or the right one? Hmm...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Anyway... thanks.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1104.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Is this what you wanted to see, Sage?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Yes indeed! Just as Nanami said, humans and mechanoids can always get along well.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'There weren\'t any humans on the starship I "saw" before. Gotta note down this difference...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nanami hunches over her terminal to make a note...'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "A little effort every day goes a long way! I'm sure I'm going to change the world!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Sage... why are you so fixated on "change"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: '"Sagemachina will return to the Church, guiding us away from this broken earth to the end of stars."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: "For mechanoids, wouldn't this be a more fitting end?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'But no one can deny that mechanical civilization arose from human civilization, Arcana.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nanami looks up, her youthful face looking unexpectedly calm.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'The fact that the Punishing Virus can infect mechanoids proves everything.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "We can run all we want, but that's not going to stop the Punishing from showing up around us again, right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I have seen it all, Arcana.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I can't tell you more, but... that's not the destination we're meant to reach.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'Then why do you place all your hope in the Gray Raven Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: "Though I'm aware of Commandant's exceptional qualities, but—Commandant's still just an ordinary human.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant is different, Arcana.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant is bound by countless bonds and connects space-time and the universe itself, like an anchor point, or... perhaps a beacon?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'We\'re now looking at another "possibility" precisely because Commandant exists...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She turns her head, a mysterious smile playing on her lips.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "You're the most special human ever, Commandant! Nanami likes you!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Struck by a pleasant thought, Nanami hums a tune as she skips merrily back to her cabin.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieLianyi.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Abandoned by Earth, the girl sits quietly by the window as she speaks, occasionally stealing glances at the blue planet billions of light-years away.'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: 'But you still have a choice, Nanami... You can choose to not become me.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMidAutumnMessageOpen.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hehe, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I figured out a way to send video messages to your voicemail!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I don't really have anything special to say, just...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'What are you up to right now, <phonetic=Nanami>Commandant</phonetic>?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami did a special fortune-telling today, and it says you will definitely see this message!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh oh, looks like time's almost up! Let me say one last thing!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '<phonetic=Nanami>Commandant</phonetic>, wait for <phonetic=me>Nanami</phonetic>!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMidAutumnMessageOpen.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMidAutumnMessageEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiGuanbixiaoshi.prefab', 2: '2', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I know things are not exactly looking hopeful, but I'll try my best to save humanity however I can—"}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Nanami...', 3: '70', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{3: 'Nanami...'}
